mdx.excerpt: Arrow function this this keyword has more than one meaning Inside of a method, this means the object which includes the method this means myObject Inside of aâ€¦

headings.value: Inside of a method, this means the object which includes the method
Inside of a constructor, this means new object
Inside of an eventlistener, this means e.currentTarget
Inside of an arrow function, the meaning of this doesn't change by objects
